name: Meteroar!
description:
Avoid the Meteors to increase your score!

Instructions: To circle clockwise simply hold the right button, and to circle counter-clockwise simply hold the left button.

Art by: Anya Biryukova (http://anyabiryukova.blogspot.com/)

Developed by: Everardo Barriga

UPDATE: Should now be playable on mobile devices!
